pages.text: The 'Super Sniffer' is the second boss in Terramity's progression.$(br2)He can be summoned anywhere in the world by striking a sniffer with lightning.$(br2)Recommended Gear:$(br) -Dimlite/Virentium armor$(br) -Strong gun$(br) -Lots of ammo

Can be summoned by striking a sniffer with lightning. Crafting a lightning staff and striking it next to a sniffer (not on, or it will die) is the easiest way to do this.$(br2)Sniffer eggs can be found somewhat rarely in many Terramity structures.
